courses.title: Ballet Basics
courses.description: Learn the fundamental techniques of ballet with our beginner-friendly course.

courses.title: Hip-Hop Foundations
courses.description: Start your hip-hop dance journey with foundational moves and rhythm techniques.

courses.title: Advanced Contemporary Dance
courses.description: Enhance your skills with advanced contemporary dance techniques for experienced dancers.

courses.title: Mastering Tap Dance
courses.description: Master the art of tap dance with our comprehensive course for all skill levels.

courses.title: Jazz Dance Techniques
courses.description: Learn the art of jazz dance with this course designed for all levels.

courses.title: Dance Choreography Basics
courses.description: Dive into choreography and learn how to create stunning dance routines.

courses.title: Latin Dance Essentials
courses.description: Master the essentials of Latin dance styles like salsa, bachata, and merengue.

courses.title: Street Dance Mastery
courses.description: Master the dynamic styles of street dance, from breaking to popping and locking.

courses.title: History of Dance
courses.description: Explore the rich history of dance from its origins to modern interpretations.

courses.title: Flamenco Dance Techniques
courses.description: Discover the beauty of Flamenco dance and master its intricate footwork and rhythms.
